intro: Unleash the purrfect power: defend, conquer, and rule with Meow Legends!
description:
Join forces with up to 3 friends in this epic offline tower defense game! As the fearless defenders of the Milk Base, you’ll take on waves of ruthless robot invaders, all while strategizing and placing powerful towers to protect your precious supply.

With teamwork and tactical genius, you and your friends must stand strong against the mechanical horde. Upgrade your towers, unlock new abilities, and harness the might of legendary feline heroes to keep the milk flowing and the robots at bay!

Can you and your squad protect the most valuable resource in the world? The fate of the Milk Base is in your paws!
